meanings.definition: The condition of abnormal growth or development, especially of excessive size.
meanings.sent1: The gigantism of the pumpkin at the fair amazed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The dinosaur's gigantism made it tower over all other creatures.
meanings.sent3: The gigantism of the snowman in the yard made the neighbors chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The gigantism of the waves crashing against the shore was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The gigantism of the tree in the forest was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is abnormally large or powerful.
meanings.sent1: The wrestler's gigantism made him a formidable opponent in the ring.
meanings.sent2: The gigantism of the elephant in the circus drew crowds from far and wide.
meanings.sent3: The gigantism of the cake at the party was a delightful surprise.
meanings.sent4: The gigantism of the mountain in the distance was a majestic sight.
meanings.sent5: The gigantism of the ship in the harbor was truly impressive.
